entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Clearing near noon. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this morning. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 20 this morning and minus 10 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 15. POP 30%
